author: aehart
body:
Treat status 104, used by Pythia8 for metastable R-hadrons, the same as status 2, so that their interactions are simulated.

The motivation for this change is discussed in this talk in the long-lived exotica group:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/386330/contribution/4/material/slides/0.pdf
title: Status 104 R-hadrons
